report.title: No Abuse Potential
report.author: theboywithoutaname
report.bodytext: T-0M 40 MG mCPP Taken /n /n T-38m /n /n Not feeling much yet, only a little 'wierdness' but I can't put my finger on what it is. /n /n T-58m /n /n Kind of dizzyness set in, also very tired since I did not sleep last night. That might be attributing to this. I also feel some very mild nausea with a mouthwatering effect at this point. I do not feel any significant euphoric effects yet. /n /n T-1h.32m /n /n Feeling mild euphoria, tiredness still here, mild jaw clenching going on. Nausea and 'Mouth Watering effect' is completely gone now. I can say i'm at a +1 right now. Nothing major or magical yet, wondering if I took too little. /n /n T-2h:36m /n /n I'm probably at a +2 now, ingested 60mg more of mCPP and 30mg Adderall XR. Euphoria is good, seems like more a mellow euphoric bliss. /n /n -Summary: /n /n This chemical seems not to go so good on its own. After I added the Adderall + 60MG mCPP the euphoria went up around x5 fold. Still alot of exploring to do left on this chem. I don't think this will become a restricted chemical, since its abuse potential is probably less than a tylenol PM =P. It definitely does not live up to the hype.
